skills.name: Flame Overload
skills.description: [SP: 15][CD: 20s] Generates three explosions to blow up nearby enemies. Each explosion deals 240% ATK of Physical DMG and ignites enemies, dealing 400 Fire DMG every 0.5s for 3s.

skills.name: Saint's Pet
skills.description: During Burst Mode, gain 18% Physical DMG. When hit or when triggering Ultimate Evasion, cast 1 burst of Active Skill. CD: 5s.
